name: Toy blaster
description:
Controls:

WASD to move or arrow keys.

Left click to shoot bullets

Right click to place bomb (cool down)

Description:

Run around a small arena fighting off red cubes that come after you. They all have unique speed and health. Fight off as long as you can and collect coins to get a higher score. OH NO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! You're surrounded by a bunch of enemies! Don't fear, place a bomb and it will kill any enemy in it's path. 

Hi, I pretty much made this game in like under an hour and so everything is just basic shapes. If you want actual cool designs and a story to it, comment because I am not very motivated to work on anything right now. I just need a strike of inspiration. 

Helpful tip: You move faster when not shooting :)
